ch0243_00_yuri/0101_0701_01_10:
Hullo, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was hoping I’d run into you!
ch0243_00_yuri/0101_0701_02_10:
Are you in the mood for some curry? I can whip
up a dish that’ll put some bounce in your step!
ch0243_00_yuri/7101_0701_01_10:
Is your partner Pokémon doing all right?
If it starts to look a little tired, make sure you
give it a quick rest, yeah?
ch0243_00_yuri/7101_0701_02_10:
Our Pokémon take all the hits for us out there on
the battlefield, so it’s up to us to make sure we
don’t push ’em too hard!
ch0243_00_yuri/7101_0701_03_10:
At least that’s what my mum told me back when I
started this whole journey!
ch0243_00_yuri/7102_0701_01_10: Have you heard of a Pokémon called Wooloo?
ch0243_00_yuri/7102_0701_02_10:
We’ve got loads of ’em back in Galar.
Their wool is super soft and warm!
ch0243_00_yuri/7102_0701_03_10:
They don’t seem to love battling too much, but
when they start rolling, their Tackle is strong
enough to knock over a fence!
ch0243_00_yuri/7103_0701_01_10:
My goal here on Pasio? Oh, that’s easy!
To make curry super popular!
ch0243_00_yuri/7103_0701_02_10:
It’s got loads of yummy spices, and you can turn
it into all sorts of different dishes! Plus, it’s
really healthy!
ch0243_00_yuri/7103_0701_03_10:
If I make the curry, will you eat three meals of it
each day to help me with my goal?
ch0243_00_yuri/7104_0701_01_10:
In Galar, there’s a big stretch of land called the
Wild Area where all sorts of wild Pokémon live.
ch0243_00_yuri/7104_0701_02_10:
The weather can change in the blink of an eye,
and there are always Dynamax Pokémon lurking
about, so it’s not exactly a walk in the park.
ch0243_00_yuri/7104_0701_03_10:
But it’s the best place there is for training!
If you pitch a tent and camp out for a few days,
it really feels like you’re out in the wilderness!
ch0243_00_yuri/7105_0701_01_10:
I love Pokémon! It’s enough for me just to be able
to travel around and have fun with them!
ch0243_00_yuri/7105_0701_02_10:
It doesn’t seem quite that simple with most of
my friends, though. They all seem to struggle
with something.
ch0243_00_yuri/7105_0701_03_10:
Is there anything you struggle with,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]? Anything you find
really hard?
ch0243_00_yuri/7105_0701_04_10:
If you start to feel burned out, we should go
camping together! I know a little fresh air always
raises my spirits!
ch0243_00_yuri/1701_0701_01_10: Here! I want you to have this!
ch0243_00_yuri/1701_0702_01_10: Oh, don’t worry about it! It’s a gift!
ch0243_00_yuri/1701_0702_02_10: I like them a lot, so I figured you might, too!
ch0243_00_yuri/2501_0701_01_10:
When I traveled across the Galar region, it was
nonstop excitement the whole time.
ch0243_00_yuri/2501_0701_02_10:
I probably owe that to my rivals. We certainly
kept each other on our toes!
ch0243_00_yuri/2501_0701_03_10:
There was Hop, Marnie, and Bede...
and now I’ve got you here on Pasio!
ch0243_00_yuri/2501_0701_04_10: Let’s make our time on the island unforgettable!
ch0243_00_yuri/2501_0702_01_10:
I met loads of brilliant people and Pokémon
in Galar.
ch0243_00_yuri/2501_0702_02_10:
But I have a feeling I’ll get to meet just as many
here on Pasio!
ch0243_00_yuri/2501_0702_03_10:
C’mon! There are places to go and people to see!
Let’s get out there and do some exploring!
ch0243_00_yuri/2511_0701_01_10:
The Galar region is pretty huge, but there’s
actually quite a lot to see here on Pasio, too!
ch0243_00_yuri/2511_0701_02_10:
Hm? My plans after I’m done here? I hadn’t really
thought about it. I suppose I’ll go back to Galar
and continue my journey.
ch0243_00_yuri/2511_0701_03_10:
That way, the journey never really has to end,
y’know? It’ll just keep going and going!
ch0243_00_yuri/2511_0701_04_10:
I’d love to visit your hometown someday,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. Maybe I can learn a
bit more about you and your partner Pokémon!
ch0243_00_yuri/2511_0702_01_10:
Traveling to new places is always really exciting,
but it can be a bit scary sometimes, too.
ch0243_00_yuri/2511_0702_02_10:
If I ever visit your hometown, you have to come
along and give me the grand tour, all right,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0243_00_yuri/3001_0701_01_10:
G’morning! C’mon, c’mon! I made breakfast!
Ta-da! It’s curry! Who doesn’t love a hearty
curry breakfast?
ch0243_00_yuri/3003_0701_01_10:
Hmm, I feel more peckish than usual. I think I’ll
make some Gigantamax Curry for lunch! It really
hits the spot!
ch0243_00_yuri/3005_0701_01_10:
Nights like this always remind me of Glimwood
Tangle. It’s a forest in Galar, full of beautiful
glowing mushrooms!
